snippet: Patrick Maroon scored an emotional goal to tie it, and then Ryan Nugent-Hopkins won it for Edmonton in overtime....
lead_paragraph: Patrick Maroon scored an emotional goal to tie it, and then Ryan Nugent-Hopkins won it for Edmonton in overtime.

headline.main: After Maroon's Emotional Equalizer, Oilers Beat Blues in OT
headline.print_headline: After Maroon's Emotional Equalizer, Oilers Beat Blues in OT
